key_points.point: Developed a Vue.js web‐based solution for B2B partners, utilizing Azure services for scalable, reliable, and secure deployment, and enhanced features.
Developed a secure REST API solution to facilitate seamless data exchange and streamline communication processes for B2B partners.
Prototyped an internal macOS app using Swift UI.
Assisted in maintaining the legacy MVC + Entity Framework stack, ensuring ongoing functionality and alignment with evolving business requirements.
Designed and implemented more than 5 end‐to‐end software solutions according to client’s requirements.
Increased code maintainability and clarity by refactoring 10% of legacy code in my area of expertise using SOLID principles and design patterns.
Enhanced code quality by establishing the groundwork for the implementation of Unit Testing within the code base.
Developed 10 three‐year Strategy Plans, focusing on both numerical estimation and the delivery of valuable key messages.
Engaged in 5 M&A transactions involving mid‐sized financial institutions, with a primary focus on synergy estimation and financial forecasting.
Overseen a complete assembly line to fulfil day‐to‐day shipment deadlines.
